name: rtm
description: Content-driven documentation site built with Next.js and MDX

scripts.postbuild: npx pagefind --site out --output-path out/pagefind && rm -rf public/pagefind && cp -r out/pagefind public/pagefind
scripts.oled:venv: cd tools/oledvec/engine-python && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.oled:process: sh -c 'if [ -z "$DEVICE" ]; then echo "Error: DEVICE environment variable is required. Example: DEVICE=analog-rytm-mkii npm run oled:process"; exit 1; fi' && cd tools/oledvec/engine-python && source venv/bin/activate && python -m oledvec process "$DEVICE"
scripts.oled:review: sh -c 'if [ -z "$DEVICE" ]; then echo "Error: DEVICE environment variable is required. Example: DEVICE=analog-rytm-mkii npm run oled:review"; exit 1; fi' && cd tools/oledvec/engine-python && source venv/bin/activate && python -m oledvec server --device "$DEVICE"
scripts.oled:dev: sh -c 'if [ -z "$DEVICE" ]; then echo "Error: DEVICE environment variable is required. Example: DEVICE=analog-rytm-mkii npm run oled:dev"; exit 1; fi' && concurrently --names "SERVER,UI" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "DEVICE=$DEVICE npm run oled:review" "cd tools/oledvec/ui && npm run dev"
